data.title: Senator Cynthia Villar
data.meta_description: Senator Cynthia Villar - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Senator Cynthia Villar was born on July 29, 1950 in Muntinlupa. She graduated from the University of the Philippines Diliman with a degree in Business Administration in 1970, where she met her future husband Senator Manny Villar. She obtained a master's degree from New York University in 1972. After marriage to Manny Villar in 1975, she helped manage his businesses and founded the Villar Foundation in 1992 where she currently serves as managing director. She has authored and sponsored numerous laws covering issues such as education, senior citizens, women's rights, and tobacco regulation.
